div.p: Governor Northam ordered that all K-12 schools close for the remainder of the academic year in response to the continued threat of COVID-19. As a result, Chesapeake Public Schools will...
﻿﻿ Congratulations to all of our 2019-2020 Teachers of the Year! Paula Labbe – Chesapeake Teacher of the Year (Deep Creek Middle School) Paula Labbe, an eighth-grade physical science teacher,...
Join us for a free 30-minute online parent and family workshop. School experts will share information and answer your questions on a variety of topics. You can register online to...

div.data-title: Facilities Master Plan – Community Dialogue Meetings

div.div: Facilities Master Plan – Community Dialogue Meetings

div.p: The City of Chesapeake, in partnership with Chesapeake Public Schools (CPS), is embarking on a long-term Facilities Master Plan (FMP) to identify and prioritize the current and future needs of...

March is Women’s History Month, designated by Presidential proclamation, and honors women’s contributions in American history. This year’s theme is “Valiant Women of the Vote.” The theme honors “the brave...

Chesapeake Public Schools is proud to celebrate Fine Arts Month in March. The fine arts encourage students to develop invaluable skills, among them creativity, observation, communication, and problem-solving. Art education...
Every ten years, the U.S. Census Bureau reports the number of people who live in the United States by conducting a count called the census. The U.S. Constitution requires the...

div.data-title: Great Bridge Middle School will participate in Solar for Students

div.div: Great Bridge Middle School will participate in Solar for Students

div.p: Chesapeake Public Schools is proud to announce that Great Bridge Middle School has been selected by Dominion Energy to participate in Solar for Students, allowing students to learn firsthand about...

Greenbrier Primary and Western Branch Primary have earned the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency’s (EPA) ENERGY STAR certification for superior energy performance. ENERGY STAR certified buildings are verified to perform in the top...
